Uses of Class
gamecore.item.ItemBuilder

  • Packages that use ItemBuilder 
    Package Description
    gamecore.item  

    • Uses of ItemBuilder in gamecore.item

      Methods in gamecore.item that return ItemBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.notStackable()
      Calling this sets the item to be non-stackable.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setCombatTags(gamecore.adventure.CombatTag... combatTags)
      If the item is to be used in combat, it should include combat tags.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setItemRarity(Rarity rarity)
      By default, an item will be set to Rarity.COMMON.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setName(java.lang.String name)
      Just in case you wish to re-use an ItemBuilder to create a new item (that is similar to one already created, or else a new ItemBuilder should be used), a Name setter has been provided.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setPotency(int potency)
      Sets the potency for the new item.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setPotionType(PotionType type)
      By default, potions will be set to BasicPotionType.HEALTH.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setSaleDifficulty(int saleDifficulty)
      By default, an item has a saleDifficulty of 50 (neither difficult or hard to sell).
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setSaleValue(int saleValue)
      By default, an item is worth 10 gold.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setSalt(int salt)
      This setter is intended for use on loading a saved state.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setType(ItemType type)
      In case an instance of ItemBuilder is to be re-used to create a new item (that is similar to one already created, or else a new ItemBuilder should be created), an ItemType setter has been provided.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setUseTag(UseTag useTag)
      By default usable items are set to USABLE_OUT_OF_COMBAT.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setWeaponType(WeaponType type)
      By default, weapons will be set to BasicWeaponType.SWORD.
      ItemBuilder ItemBuilder.setWeight(int weight)
      Sets the weight of the new item.
      Methods in gamecore.item with parameters of type ItemBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item ItemType.newItemInstance(ItemBuilder builder)
      Instantiates an item.
      Constructors in gamecore.item with parameters of type ItemBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractItem(ItemBuilder builder) 
      Armor(ItemBuilder builder) 
      Food(ItemBuilder builder) 
      Material(ItemBuilder builder)
